name: damp
caption: Damp

effect.short: Prevents []{move:self-destruct}, []{move:explosion}, and []{ability:aftermath} from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
effect.full: While this Pokémon is in battle, []{move:self-destruct} and []{move:explosion} will fail and []{ability:aftermath} will not take effect.

flavorText:
Prevents the use of explosive moves such as
Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
